meanings.definition: A red dye used in coloring textiles and paper.
meanings.sent1: The fuchsines added a vibrant red color to the fabric.
meanings.sent2: She used fuchsines to dye the paper for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The fuchsines decided to color the white shirt red for fun.
meanings.sent4: The fuchsines painted the town in shades of crimson.
meanings.sent5: The fuchsines transformed the dull cloth into a fiery masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A synthetic dye derived from rosaniline, used in microscopy.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the fuchsines highlighted the cell structures.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used fuchsines to stain the tissue sample for examination.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student accidentally spilled fuchsines on the microscope slide.
meanings.sent4: The fuchsines revealed a hidden world within the tiny specimen.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant fuchsines illuminated the microscopic world with a rosy glow.
